Safety Instructions Instrucciones para la Seguridad
A320
Virgins
america
Federal regulations require compliance with crew instructions, lighted
passenger information signs and posted placards at all times.
For your safety, passengers must comply with the Fasten Seat Belt sign and it is
recommended that you keep your seat belt fastened at all times while seated.
If you are seated in an exit seat and do not understand English or the information
on this card, please identify yourself to a flight attendant for reseating.
Do not remove this card from the aircraft
